summary: The AILine class represents a neural network line with strength, type, and port properties. It is connected to at least two AI pointers and forms a "neural network" when combined with other lines. The 'otherPointers' method returns an array of pointers from the other end.

details.comment: This code defines the AILine class in the SMG_NothingIsAll project. It represents a neural network line with properties such as strength, type, and a port. The line is connected to at least two AI pointers and can form a "neural network" when combined with other lines. When destroyed, it notifies the garbage collector to clean up any data that is no longer referenced.
This code defines a method 'otherPointers' that takes an AIPointer object as parameter and returns an NSArray of pointers from the other end.
